website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, all-natural liquid that is safe for all cats.
pros: Despite the low price, this is a reliable natural solution that works to calm energetic cats or make vet visits easier
Customers love how quickly these drops work when put in food
cons: Some customers found that they needed to double the recommended dose for it to be effective

customer_reviews.title: I believe it helped, although there is no actual proof for my word.
customer_reviews.text: I feel my dogs got a little less anxious when I started to use it with them once per day. It might be worth mentioning that I started walking them once per day as well, which helped a lot with their anxiety in a general way.
customer_reviews.author: Sharp_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best on market,they actually work!
customer_reviews.text: Best anti-anxiety drops on the market for scared/anxious dogs. Don't waste your money on any of others including expensive plug ins as this is the only one that actually works
customer_reviews.author: JOHUTCH

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes a Calm and happy collie
customer_reviews.text: To start with we could not believe how much calmer our border collie Alfie was since he started on these drops - worked after only two doses. It was really lovely to see him more settled and enjoying life again. :D Unfortunately after a few days the effect seemed to cease :( Would have given 5* but had to change to 3*
customer_reviews.author: Farmers wife

customer_reviews.title: Try it. You'll love it
customer_reviews.text: It works. I have 2 collie mixes for nearly 10 years now. Calms them when travelling.
customer_reviews.author: ribhub

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked really well on our collie for car trips love it
customer_reviews.author: m d bennett

customer_reviews.title: No discernible effect
customer_reviews.text: No discernible effect, we used the product as per instructions. Wanted them for separation anxiety but didn't work for us on a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Sewpanpen

customer_reviews.title: My dog is in great distress at this time of year
customer_reviews.text: My dog is in great distress at this time of year, but these are managing the situation and making her life a lot easier
customer_reviews.author: susan smith

customer_reviews.title: Worked very quickly on my dog who gets very worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very quickly on my dog who gets very worked up when left alone.Just ordered another two as I don't want to run out!
customer_reviews.author: kaya

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Given in my dogs food 3x daily. Seems to take off the edge.
customer_reviews.author: charlieb

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed with this product. It has done nothing for both of my cats to relieve stress.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: baldy the cats turned to blacky the cat
customer_reviews.text: My cats hair has started to grow back on her underbelly and legs after a week of taking it twice a day.I have now cut it down to once a day and she is so relaxed and has stopped pulling her hair out. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ged toop

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This had absolutely no effect whatsoever . Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Foxylady

customer_reviews.title: Did not notice any difference.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our standard poodles separation anxiety,didn't notice any difference. In the end,he went on something stronger from the vet which helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: DCEley

customer_reviews.title: It works for me...and my cat Jonathan!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work so this is my 2nd order. I was going away on holiday so needed fast and it arrived on Sunday so brilliant for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W. E. Ransome

customer_reviews.title: It may work.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for several months now, since adopting a second cat, to help them to settle down with each other. I don't know for sure that it's effective, but when I ran out the hissing and growling increased.
customer_reviews.author: Keiko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works 90% of the time for my over anxious schnauzer!
customer_reviews.author: lover of schnauzers

customer_reviews.title: dog is calmer
customer_reviews.text: Our dog with really strong anxiety still had anxiety after taking these. Maybe it works little bit but it is hard to judge with these subtle changes.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat
customer_reviews.text: Our cat has been using this product for a few years now from the vets, but it is a lot cheaper from this suplier and works just as well; I will be buying from them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: mrs k

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how well this actually works. I just moved with my cat from a forest setting that is quiet and hidden into an apartment complex in the city. She was so nervous that she wouldn't sleep through the night and whined loudly for hours; I wasn't getting any sleep. I tried the smaller size because I'm always hesitant about these "homeopathic remedies," but I was pleasantly surprised. She does still whine a little, but after a few days of using the product, her anxiety is noticeably lower. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: VGSB

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog trainer recommended this for my dog who has separation anxiety and leash reactivity. I wasn't sure at first whether the improvements in her personality and behavior were the result of training or the drops... A week long lapse in usage (twice) due to me not re-ordering it quickly enough has shown it is likely helping her. I drop it onto her kibble for feedings, so it's really easy to use. Based on that and sInce there is no harm and it's not expensive, I'll continue to use it regularly. In fact I should probably put it on auto-delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dahlgren

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my dog chill...
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue dog that was abused by his previous owner and developed an anxiety disorder because of it. When he came to us, he was afraid of EVERYTHING. Years later, he's much better, but still deals with day-to-day general anxiety. The vet prescribed him mess, but they turn him into a very sleepy pile of pooch so we hate to use them. Instead, I put him on these drops and within a week, we had a much happier dog and his tail waging up in the air proved it. We have a better (and goofier) version of our dog and he's leading a much happier and less anxious life.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: It works.....
customer_reviews.text: Multi cat house. One is a little aggressive, are all feral babies and seem natural bent to being jumpy easily startled. To drop in the morning to drops in the evening depending on cat put it on top of some wet food or treat good to go. It does work give it time. I've paid attention to what cats might need a little bit more or need a little bit less don't want to lose their personality just help them with the anxiety. Also help reduce stress level to help reduce the chance of struvite Crystal reoccurrence - please note diet is also important with struvite crystals not just anxiety or environment.
customer_reviews.author: Cattitude

customer_reviews.title: helped my new adopted dog
customer_reviews.text: my new adopted dog got Very nervous during a bad storm here. his little heart was pounding and he started panting. i put the drops in alittle water and offered it to him. he took it. he did calm down. takes about 30 mins to really see the calming effect. Next time I will offer it when I know a storm is coming. later he had an upset tummy and did a small vomit. nerves? or the tonic?? who’s to know. he was not sick, sick. because he is new to me Im not sure of his bad weather behaviors and nerves. He did calm down though.
customer_reviews.author: D'Lee C.

customer_reviews.title: Calms just enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a young Quaker parrot who had been treated badly before we'r got him. He would absolutely lose his mind if you got your hands near him. It was so sad. Here needed a little help so he could see that he was safe. I put a couple of drops in his water and rather than scrambling to get away from hands even on the outside of the cage he comes to fingers for a treat. We're still working with him, but he comes for a treat and isn't going to hurt himself trying to get away from someone who isn't even bothering him.
customer_reviews.author: JoMomma

customer_reviews.title: Made my pet bird cockatiel vomit immediately
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made my cockatiel vomit immediately. At first I thought it was an excited large poop, but when I look I saw his undigested pellet clump. Would not reccomend this odious mixture be put in the daily wayer supply. Don't know of a simpler alternative administration
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for my miniature schnauzer who suffers with severe anxiety during fireworks and storms. At first I tried using it in her water and it had no effect. But recently we had several days of strong thunderstorms and she was freaking out. I put 3-4 drops in her mouth and she started calming down within a few minutes. During one of the storms with extended thunder it took a second dose 15-30 minutes later. I’ve used it 3 times in the last two weeks and it’s amazing how well it worked. And the other benefit is that I was able to go to sleep, albeit she was laying on top of me. But we both got some shuteye!!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. M.

customer_reviews.title: anxiety for my fur baby
customer_reviews.text: I want to say this is working but I really am not sure. She has so much anxiety. Slightest sounds, movements really causes her anxiety. I got her as a rescue and have had her for a year. She does seem a little better but not as my other two where they are so comfortable she is always on edge. I wish she could talk to find out what happened to cause this. I give her 5 drops morning and night in her meal with chamomile tea. which helps with calmness. I have been using this for few months and have another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Doty Girl

customer_reviews.title: Really seems to work...
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful but ready to try anything. Our cat, a feral, is anxious and sometimes he could get a little nasty. Within 2 weeks of using this I noticed him becoming definitely mellower. Two months after I started it we moved, a 7 hour car trip for a cat who hates cars so much he hadn’t been in one for over 3 years. Although I did have to give him a prescription med for the trip, I believe that this anti-anxiety formula helped a lot in getting him adjusted to our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use with stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my dog who has inflammatory bowel disease in hopes of relieving her anxiety, thus keeping her stomach calm. All it did was make her vomit. It was the only new thing introduced to her diet. I stopped for a week, then gave it to her again, just to make sure. I’m a terrible mom! She just puked three times! I would be wary if your pet has stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri M.

customer_reviews.title: Use caution...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened and try to squeeze drops into pups mouth the top portion of dispenser(cap),shot into my 9 week old puppies mouth. Could have swallowed or choked. I also lost a good portion of the product. I'm sure this was a freak thing.. But it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Parismy♡

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool While Grooming
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is more fearful of many things than I have experienced with other dogs, and this product administered in his water 15-20 minutes ahead of time allowed me to scissor his coat for the first time while he relaxed. Of course I also fed him treats, but I would not have been able to do this without relaxing; sooooo grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Littlebip

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: My dog had no change on this. It's liquid so it has to be added to water or dropped in her mouth. It must taste bad because she refuses to drink her water when I put it in there. I added some to wet food to disguise the flavour and she never had a change of behaviour.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: My budgie's feathers grew back😁😁😁😁
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little budgie (parakeet) she was pulling her chest feathers out from anxiety bc I wasn't able to give her as much attention as she's used to (My mother was in a head on collision and I spent a lot of time in the hospital, she almost died). After about 2 weeks of trying out dosage amounts (I eventually discovered 6 drops in her water; she only sips her water here and there so she wasn't getting any of it really per sip) I finally started noticing her chest feathers growing back!! I'm SO relieved! This stuff works, you just gotta keep trying for a dosage that works for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Best product so far
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to help birds anxiety and plucking somewhat . Best product I have tried so far . Have to use everyday I’m going to try using it twice a day and see . Easily disguised in lafabers food balls or injected into a grape or whatever snack your bird prefers . I wish it worked better but my expectations are high as I have 9 birds 8 of which are parrots :/
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Can't hurt, might help
customer_reviews.text: My dog has separation anxiety, as well as anxiety about new places and strange dogs. Some of these ingredients helped when his anxiety was at its height, so I thought I'd give the drops a try. Unfortunately I didn't notice any changes in any of his anxieties after 15 drops 3 times a day for about a month (the entire bottle). that's not to say it doesn't work, just not for my guy.
customer_reviews.author: fedx8Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Oh no noice yay
customer_reviews.text: My dog would whine for hours or until the sun comes up but not anymore thanks to this. Do you hear that of course not its the drops :)
customer_reviews.author: jacinta

customer_reviews.title: Works, Easy to administer
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my cat. Yes it did help his anxiety. However i had to use too much to get the level brought down, which means the bottle did not last long and for the price was not feasible for daily use. I recommend it for anyone who only needs occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelin K. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This will be my second time ordering this product. My dog gets over excited and starts coughing on the inside. Once you begin this treatment it truly helps for her sneezing and coughing.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew kyker

customer_reviews.title: HELPS SO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: Pup gets nervous. Does not like loud noises. Has a bit of a attention disorder. Shadows spook him. The butterflies scare him too!! Give him some oral or on shoulders before walk...calm as a cucumber.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Calming
customer_reviews.text: He doesn't notice the taste, but I had to give him more than 10 drops, I just doubled up the dose, lasts about 4 hours and it's extremely helpful for an old emotionally supportive dog.
customer_reviews.author: rashidas mama

customer_reviews.title: HomoPet Anxiety Relief is the truth.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to calm a frisky cat and promote assertiveness in two passive cats. The two older cats do not cower as much as long and they are regularly fed the anxiety relief in their water bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: did not help our girl
customer_reviews.text: Dot became scared of going on walks. I had hoped this would be an alternative to the drugs we discontinued after they caused her personality to change, . The Homeopet products I have used in the past have worked well ,but unfortunately this did not help her. I saw no change in her fear of walks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth P

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, I have extremely high anxiety dogs and I have to use this produce before any training , bathing, or if we leave them and they will be ok for a little while. Haven't got their dose right yet.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: This seemed to help immensely
customer_reviews.text: Our family suffered a loss and we had to move. It took a toll on my already very anxious dog, a border collie mix, and we did everything we could to soothe her. This helped immensely, especially during storms.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Works on my 5lb puppy
customer_reviews.text: These work great on my puppy but I use a LOT. I put it in her food and water and it’s gone in like 2 days. She is extremely high energy and sometimes no matter how much exercise she just won’t calm down so I use these. The drops definitely calm her down and she will get tired/cuddly or fall asleep pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great!! My Shih Tzu I scared of thunderstorms. I put 4 drops on a piece of turkey before the storm got here and put on her thundershirt. She was very calm!!! What a difference!!! Couldn't believe it!! This really works. Didn't make her drowsy at all. Just nice and calm.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. A few drops before a storm comes and they are calm and not scared. I also have the itch relief that works well for dry itchy skin
customer_reviews.author: Julia murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it works well for my dog with severe anxiety, and is a great alternative to constantly having to give him pills that srents natural. My only issue with the product it the first few uses it really upset my boys stomach and caused him to have diarrhea, I took him to his vet and she said it was fairly normal if he had never had them before but it was still concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Did help
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was pulling his hair out and biting at him self.. while on this he has been alot better
customer_reviews.author: aaron bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great for car travel.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet, but used this product several years ago when we were moving a long distance. It really worked and I will continue to use as needed.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates the groomer and I was hoping this would calm her down a bit. IT DID NOT MAKE A DIFFERENCE AT ALL. I even added more than the said does and I could not tell one bit of difference. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: V Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, really helped my cat feel more at ease in stressful situations. I didn't expect much, but this was really a nice surprise. I would say it lasts about 2-3h which is great for driving to the vet. The only downside is the taste, my cat was not impressed and didn't want to take it at all... so there is some help needed for her to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesena

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: My dog took her first plane ride a few days ago and this stuff worked like a charm, she kinda freaked out upon landing and we gave her another couple of drops no more problems. Works about 3-4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has severe separation anxiety and so we tried this product for her. It instantly calms her down and takes her anxiety away. This product is so amazing. She also has bad anxiety when we both leave for work so we give her a few drops in the morning and when we come back, she is fine! Thank u so much for creating this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alina Zabroski

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few bottles hoping time would help, but, no it does nothing for my dog. Gave a bottle to a friend to help relax her over zealous pup, again it did nada. spent money on a product that might as well be water. will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Rose

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We have noticed a big difference in our dog since starting these drops...we put them on a dog cookie when we know a storm is coming or fireworks. It helps keep him from being so stressed out.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: It might work
customer_reviews.text: I like to believe it works. When I give it to my kitten he eats and then rest but I also mix it with other things so
customer_reviews.author: JayeTheMaverick

customer_reviews.title: Worked a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 16 year old Pom. He gets anxious very easily now. It seemed to work the first couple of times it was given. We had to increase amount within a couple of days. Then, we noticed it had zero effect on him.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because I was hesitant to give my dog a prescription tranquilizing drug but it was totally useless. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for nervous cats
customer_reviews.text: Man alive, this stuff really works for my cat. Sometimes she gets anxiety as a formerly feral kitty or a little crazy on the full moon. Definely a help for visits to the vet. Keeps her calm and collected. I put drops in some cat gravy. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A heaven sent item for the fireworks season and storm season here in Florida. It WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: pam d

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: When on the road, I can settle my labs with this product. They can get nervous when I'm driving or in a motel. This works great, even to the extent that I have been able to take myself out to dinner, and feel that they are not panicking.
customer_reviews.author: jimmymac

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver. I have a Border Collie, a Border Collie Mix & a Chihuahua all terrified of storms & fireworks. I give 2 of them to my BC mix and the others get 1. It doesn't make them sleepy or drugged, it just relaxes them. If there is a REALLY stressful event happening, I add Homeo Pet's Anxiety Relief and the results are even more spectacular. Love love love these products!
customer_reviews.author: AnimalEnthusiast

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This help a lot when he kept barking at nite till we got his skin.itching under control all these products are super good
customer_reviews.author: LINDA L PUGH

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Tried using this for about a month on my overactive Timneh Grey. I didn't notice any change in his temperament or behavior. Don't' buy this useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as well as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: These drops took the edge off my dog while traveling but did not calm him down as much as I would have liked. I also had to stop and give him more every couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works if you use it as directed. Use it for separation anxiety, vet visits, claw trimming, traveling. DOES help.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Price good, but does. It work for all dogs..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a neighbor of mine uses it for her dogs, especially during storms and traveling. Unfortunately it did not work for mine who is ER anxious during these times. I nderstand it might work for some dogs, and some not but it was worth a try and the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Regina taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how the cat feels
customer_reviews.text: He is now using the camomile collar and the anxiety drops. Seems like it helps. Can't ask him and really can't tell.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Oldie

customer_reviews.title: Strong alcohol smell
customer_reviews.text: It smelt like straight alcohol and my cat didn't like it at all. It didn't stop the meowing and even though it was cheap in my opinion I will not be repurchasing. The hunt is still on for me
customer_reviews.author: Precious macon

customer_reviews.title: Not for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would help my dogs car anxiety, unfortunately it didn’t seem to help!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Church

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Use it on Lab to calm her down while trimming nails
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a very nervous dog that barks constantly when we have guests and this really seems to work for her, even better than Xanax. It's definitely worth a try especially for how affordable it is!
customer_reviews.author: Shanyn Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great for calming my dog
customer_reviews.text: My older dogs gets very anxious. This has been great to supplement for her to help her calm Down and sleep in the evenings
customer_reviews.author: rkthomas99

customer_reviews.title: Easy to administer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to dispense straight to the mouth or water since it's liquid. Update my review after few days if using on one of my dogs that is developed a fear of usual routine like putting on collar or sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Jurga2323

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful for my old dog
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! I am giving it to my 17 year old miniature poodle for his nighttime restlessness and he is much calmer. Thank you for such a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Rita M. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Have 4 cats and a dog, this works wonders around any holiday consisting of fireworks. Start it in their water about 24 hours before everything and you'll be good.
customer_reviews.author: Reaper1125

customer_reviews.title: Rat terrier
customer_reviews.text: My dog just must be to hyper because it didn't work for him in the car to settle him down for the 4hr ride. But I have friends that it works great for
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is almost magic. Calms during thunderstorms, when we have a lot of people over or any other stress that causes anxiety! With no harmful drugs. Could not ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: D. Semple

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my old dogs for travel and when firework season is upon is and is really does calm them down. They wat it fine I just put the drops on a peice of bread and they eat it.
customer_reviews.author: MissLiss

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopeful that this would work to calm down 1 of my cats. I saw no change in behavior in any of my animals. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Homeopet anxeity relif
customer_reviews.text: Use occasionally when cat is wound up. Good stuff, fast ship. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Cat calming
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to ease the stress rv travel has on one of our cats. Still working out dosage
customer_reviews.author: Allen Antonson

customer_reviews.title: Not for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Not working for my cat. I gave him 30mins before I bring him to car. He is still very anxious
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is helped my kitties so much! We traveled across the country and it definitely has helped aid in her getting used to our new space. Have already bought again and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna K.

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: Our babies Sundowning is just getting too bad for this alone, but it worked for a while & short term. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: FrogQueen

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: used for our large dog occasionally when anxious, works great
customer_reviews.author: l h

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love this especially around the Fourth of July my pups hate fireworks and this keeps their stress down
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: This seems to help with my 2 cats anxiety. I put it in their water every morning. They seem more relaxed without being drugged.
customer_reviews.author: K Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: easy and worked
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because it did not have arsenic as a main ingredient like the other options did. I put a few drops of this onto wet cat food for my cats because they easily become stressed for road trips. One cat usually gets car sick. This product absolutely helped. Neither cat became stressed or car sick for our trip. Follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: DocRob

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the same (anxiety relief) and got once of what i ordered and a nose relief, which i don't need, but it can be useful in the future for me or someone i know, i just hope next time i order this doesn't happen again. Best regards.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Calms him down great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helps his anxiety since sister kitty went to Rainbow Bridge
customer_reviews.author: Lektra

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have been using the drops for about a week and my Frenchie has stopped scratching and licking himself as much as he was
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: My canine is terrified of storms. I can give him 3-4 drops on a treat and he calms down immediately. I do have to repeat this every 15 minutes that it’s thundering, but it’s been a lifesaver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work on all dogs
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work on my (4yro) (6lb) Male Morkie.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Davis

customer_reviews.title: These drops provided great relief for my senior border collie
customer_reviews.text: These drops provided great relief for my senior border collie. The drops are super bitter smelling, so I put them on a milk bone biscuit and she would gobble them right up. They are great for helping with most general anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This product really works for occasional anxiety for my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: This product really works for occasional anxiety for my dogs. When we need to travel or have company, I simply put drops on a biscuit about an hour before, and they calm right down. This has also worked for my cat. I have used this for calming my lab during fireworks, as well as overall excitement during tent set-up while camping. This seems to be safe and reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Ogirl

customer_reviews.title: Chill X 10
customer_reviews.text: Knocks my cat Out! Totally chill, not a care in the world. Eventually he falls asleep. Does the job I guess.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fitch

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my feral kitty and put it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my feral kitty and put it in her water. It does make a difference. I have repurchased several time.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rain

customer_reviews.text: This seemed to have helped my cat, Thomas. He’s a very anxious cat and would wake up in the middle of night and meow all night and bite mine and my boyfriend’s toes! Most nights, I give him a few droplets on his wet food and he sleeps through the night and is still his normal, perky self during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

product_meta.title: HomeoPet Anxiety Relief
product_meta.description: Promotes a sense of calm in animals exhibiting fear, fretting, anxiety, or unwanted behavior caused by: 1) Being left alone/Separation 2) Kenneling, shows 3) Vet Visits 4) Grooming. Helps with Barking, whining, howling, yelping, crying, pacing, panting, restlessness, hiding under table, in bathroom, behind couch. Relieves cowering, trembling, shaking, drooling, vomiting, pooping, destructive behavior.
feature_bullets: No known side effects; safe for kittens, puppies, pregnant and nursing animals
Free of all chemicals; uses only the purest, naturally grown raw materials
Manufactured under an FDA registered process
Clinically used on dogs, cats, birds, rabbits, hamsters, ferrets and pot-bellied pigs
